data.title: Ray Charles dies at 73
data.meta_description: BEVERLY HILLS, California (AP) -Ray Charles, the Grammy-winning crooner who blended gospel and blues in such crowd-pleasers as "What'd I Say" and ballads like "Georgia on My Mind," died Thursday, a spokesman said. He was 73.{{more}}Charles died at his Beverly Hills home surrounded by family and friends, said spokesman Jerry Digney.Charles' last public appearance was alongside Clint Eastwood on April 30, when the city of Los Angeles designated the singer's...
